TITLE: FireTweet Powered by Lantern
FIRETWEET_INTRO: FireTweet is an Android app powered by Lantern that gives direct unblocked access to Twitter from anywhere in the world.
FIRETWEET_INTRO_MOBILE: An Android app powered by Lantern that gives direct unblocked access to Twitter from anywhere in the world.
FEATURE_4: Gives the full experience of Twitter to users in regions where Twitter is blocked
FEATURE_5: Automatically integrates with Twitter, use an existing account or create a new one
FEATURE_6: All HTTP traffic is routed through a distributed network of direct proxies
